definition: regardless of the consequences/recklessly relying on a hopelessly optimistic forecast
pinyin: bu4 guan3 san1 qi1 er4 shi2 yi1

definition: three sevens are twenty-one (idiom)/the facts of the matter/the actual situation
ratio seventy to thirty/thirty percent failure, seventy percent success
thirty percent failure, seventy percent success, the official PRC verdict on Mao Zedong
who cares/no matter what/regardless of the consequences
pinyin: guan3 ta1 san1 qi1 er4 shi2 yi1

sentences.english: Objective To study the chemical constituents of Sedum aixoon L.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究景天三七全草的化学成分。

sentences.english: Objective To optimize the conditions for the percolation extraction process of Panax notoginseng (Burk. ) F.
sentences.chinese: 目的优选三七的最佳渗漉提取工艺。

sentences.english: My mother was born on 3 rd of March, 1937.
sentences.chinese: 我妈妈出生在一九三七年三月三号。

sentences.english: Objective: To study the immunoregulation effect of Panax notoginseng polysaccharides on mice.
sentences.chinese: 目的优选三七的最佳提取工艺。

sentences.english: But sometimes you just have to take the plunge.
sentences.chinese: 你是说，让我不管三七二十一，跳进海里就好了？

sentences.english: It was in 1937 when Japanese soldiers broke into the city Beiping.
sentences.chinese: 日本鬼子闯入北平城是在一九三七年。

sentences.english: Sanqi Has "fresh hits cooked tonic" the effect.
sentences.chinese: 三七具有“生打熟补”的功效。

sentences.english: This paper was to investigate the mutagenicity of KINGPANAX fresh Panax notoginseng juice.
sentences.chinese: 研究了金不换鲜三七液特殊毒理学效应的致突变性。

sentences.english: Objective The physiological and biochemical changes were studied during the Panax notoginseng's fruit development.
sentences.chinese: 目的对三七果实发育过程中的生理生化变化进行研究。

sentences.english: In 1937 the Chinese people threw themselves into an all-out war of resistance against Japanese aggression.
sentences.chinese: 一九三七年，中国人民开始了全民族的抗日战争。

sentences.english: Methods The TLC method was used to distinguish the Radix Notoginseng and the Radix Aucklandiae in this prescription.
sentences.chinese: 方法采用TLC对本处方中的三七和木香进行鉴别。

sentences.english: The residues of the organic pesticides exceeded national standard in Pogostemon cablin and Panax notoginseng.
sentences.chinese: 广藿香和三七中有机氯农药残留超过国家标准。

sentences.english: Results Guangxi is the origin area of Panax notoginseng which was named Tianqi commonly.
sentences.chinese: 结果认为三七原产于广西，常用名为田七。

sentences.english: Saponins of the rhizome of Panax japonicus var. bipinnatifidus and its significance of chemotaxonomy.
sentences.chinese: 羽叶三七根茎的三萜皂甙成分及其化学分类学意义。

sentences.english: AIM To study the effects of panax notoginsenosidum on coronary heart disease.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察三七总甙注射液治疗冠心病的疗效。

sentences.english: Objective To optimize the extraction procedure of total saponins from Radix notoginseng for compound Huangqi Changning enemA.
sentences.chinese: 目的优选复方黄芪肠宁灌肠剂中三七的最佳提取工艺。

definition: King Solomon's seal (plant of genus Polygonatum)
root of herbaceous peony (Paeonia lactiflora), used in TCM
Achyranthes bidentata (root used in Chinese medicine)
Ningpo figwort (Scrophularia ningpoensis)/root of Ningpo figwort (used in TCM)
